petri.api
Class GameImage

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      petri.api.GameImage
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
AnimatedImage, DualResolutionGameImage
public class GameImage
extends java.awt.Component

The base class for all Images used in the game. Generates a pixel-perfect outline of the Image by determining boundaries as a change between an alpha (transparant) pixel and a non-alpha (color) pixel. As such, this method is only accurate in determining the actual image contained in a .png. User must override to support other edge-detection methods if they want pixel-perfect collisions for other image formats, or .pngs with non-transparent backgrounds.

Author:
Cody Swendrowski
See Also:
Serialized Form
